ISSUE.TITLE: Disable "date of birth" customer form field by default
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: 4.60.0 There's no need to have it enabled by default. So let's disable it during the installation

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: #6479 Removed unused and not exists route We forgot to delete it in the ed1321d282a42b786747e6528bfb1368854275b9 commit

COMMIT.MESSAGE: #6522 Disable date of birth by default (#6537)
